title: Smoking Guns Shooting Gallery
description:
Get your rifle out and get ready to shoot! Smoking Guns is the greatest
shooting gallery in the world. Shoot the toughest cowboys in the Western
levels, take aim in the Horror and Alien Levels or insert your own digital
pictures in the game! Core Gameplay: 6 unique environments to master Thousands
of possible variations on every level, which you can leave to chance or set
yourself Have fun inserting your own digital pictures right into the game and
shoot away! Over 60 different opponents and numerous hidden targets Ingenious
and motivating points system which rewards accuracy and shooting speed 4
difficulty levels from "easy" to "crazy hard" 4 unique weapons like the good
old shotgun and the machine gun

Shoot a variety of targets - or create your own!Take aim at the Cowboy Level
the Alien Level, the Horror Level or use your own images to create a level of
your own
